Hue value for category color tokens (color.foreground.secondary.category, color.border.category, color.text.onForegroundSecondary.category). Override this on the element to set a custom hue while maintaining accessibility (lightness and chroma remain consistent with their non-category counterparts). Use for user-generated categories, tags, or chips where semantic color meaning isn't predefined. Default 0 produces a neutral gray.

Lightness adjustment for primary foreground root hover state on light backgrounds. These additional tokens are needed because the root state uses black/white instead of gray 520 (gray looked off for the colorless variant), so the base lightness differs from other primary foreground colors.
